name: Chika Fujiwara - Kaguya-sama
description:
What does it do you ask? Chika Fujiwara and her peppy personality is coming home with two slight variants on her costume (as well as if you want to put the little detective cap on her head. Pretty simple Lora overall in terms of what it does.

How to use it:

(I use Sampling Method DPM++ SDE Karras and Upscaler R-ESRGAN 4x+ Anime6B).

0.7 to 1 depending on model/lora/etc combination.

Main Triggers

ChikaF, black school uniform, long sleeves - Trigger word to give her the long sleeve outfit

ChikaF, black school uniform, short sleeves - Trigger word to give her the short sleeve outfit.

cabbie hat, detective - To give her the little detective hat

Then add whatever else you want! Removing ChikaF completely can help if you're trying to change outfits.

Extra, Extra!: Should be well trained and usable in most models. Images shown for example.

Picture Descriptions:

1-3: AnythingV3 with just this Lora and showing her long sleeves, short sleeves, and her hat.

4: AnythingV3 combo'd with my in progress Biker Chick Locon.

5: AnythingV3 combo'd with my in progress Succubus Locon

6: AnythingV3 combo'd with my in progress Good Cop Locon.

7: AnythingV3 combo'd with my in progress Bad Cop Locon.

8: AnythingV3 combo'd with my in progress Bound Yuri Locon.

9: AnythingV3 combo'd with my in progress Infected Locon.

10: AnythingV3 combo'd with a dope Mary Skelter Lora from the community (located here -> https://civitai.com/models/60613/blood-skelter-transformation)

11: AbyssOrange using just this Lora.

12-13: RevAnimated using just this Lora.

How was it trained?

It was trained on animefull_final with 28 images with the usual self-pruning and tagging and a wide range of different images. I like keeping my prompts simple for the first few pictures so that you can see it without a whole bunch of mumbo jumbo. Make your pictures better than mine though!

What's next for this?

I think it's fine? LMK.

What's next that isn't this?

More character Loras. (Rupee and Volume from Nikke, Spectre Tenebria from E7, Zephia from Fire Emblem Engage, Ivy from Soul Calibur 5, Heine from Combatants Will Be Dispatched, Conqueror Lilias from E7, Evelynn from LoL (both base and All Out version), Tharja from Fire Emblem, Laharl-Chan from Disgaea 5, Miku from Idaten Deities, Kuribayashi Shino from GATE, Rin Sohma from Fruits Basket, Kasumi from P5, Ann from P5, Ikumi Mito from Food Wars, Alice Nakiri from Food Wars, Lulu from FF10, Lucoa from Dragon Maid, Laharl-chan from Disgaea, Dominique de Sade from Vanitas, and Dos from One Punch Man.) And maybe Wilhelm van Astrea, my favorite Re:Zero husbando or a Prinny from Disgaea.

V2's of some of the previous Loras. Specifically make them more diversely acceptable with other models and LORA's.

I also have some more quite NSFW Locon's. I decided to list them as well, so if people have preferences on which to fix up first let me know. Specifically, Bound Yuri (two girls tied up, breast to breast and likely kissing), Sultry Succubus Transformation, Tied up with vibrators (basically the waifu tied up with vibrators and being overwhelmed with pleasure), Beta Censorship (Automatically censors any images you create to make them BetaSafe), being stepped on, Robotification, Petrified (I'm unsure if I should bother with this one anymore), Infection (this one is VERY nsfw, as the waifu is completely infected), Dominatrix (waifu becoming a dominatrix), Tentacles, Pillory, Masked Evil (A mask that possess' the waifu), Latex Corruption, Combat Drone (hard to describe but basically making them a mindless sci-fi combat warrior), JAV Supervillain, Blacked, Hypnotized Harem, Hourglass Figure (just to make your waifu curvy), and Holding a Leash.

And, uh, I want to make a few SFW Locon's so I have a Delinquent (The delinquent girls in japanese schools specifically), GoodCop/BadCop (Locon with outfits for being a good and for being a bad cop), Maid (both normal and naughty variants), Biker Chick (ride a motorcycle and look like you should), Race Queen (Chiling sexily on a car), forest fairy, Anime Officer, barbarian.

Or just give me some random suggestion or priority opinions. That works too.

I've also added a couple of my extreme NSFW preview images to my twitter (https://twitter.com/TwoMoreTimes89). Let me know if you think I should work on them more for a submission here.
